original_definition: '2-star compartment' means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 12 °C, as set out in Annex IV, Table 3;
generated_definition: '2-star compartment' means a compartment with a maximum capacity of 2 passengers, as designated by the train operator.

Article 2: ‘2-star compartment’ means afrozen compartmentwith atarget temperature and storage conditions of - 12 °C, as set out in Annex IV, Table 3;
‘2-star compartment’ means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 12 °C, as set out in Annex IV, Table 3;
